name: Life Is Feudal: MMO
summary: An ideological and practical successor of a well-known medieval survival simulator Life is Feudal: Your Own. While continuing the traditions of the franchise, Life is Feudal: MMO implements its specific features on a much global scale. Here, players are building towns, cities, establishing civilizations and global political system on a giant 21x21 km pre-generated continent.
